page.title: 01GAZETEER_ EGMANTON & LAXTON
page.content: EGMANTON: Population; 198_ 107 male,91 female Area 897 hectares. Density 0.22 persons per hectare. 26.77% under 16. 18.18% pensioners. 1.75% men unemployed. 80.30% houses owner occupied. 81.82% with car. Amenities:_Church, Chapel, pub, no main sewers or gas, bus service, sub post office, Library van. LAXTON: Population;294_ 148 male,146 female Area 1,621 hectares. Density 0.18 persons per hectare. 21.43% under 16. 15.65% pensioners. 11.11% men unemployed. 39.39% houses owner occupied. 77.78% with car. Amenities:_ As Egmanton; shop also.
